ygData.subject: Re: Nerfing quest components (OT) (was alt.games.everquest)
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, there are already no-bank items that can be dropped / traded, such as a shaman s summoned bags. ... From: Kyle  To:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, there are already no-bank items that can be dropped / traded, such
as a shaman's summoned bags.
----- Original Message -----
From: Kyle <ksibbald@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, September 14, 1999 7:07 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Nerfing quest components (OT) (was
alt.games.everquest)


> From: "Kyle" <ksibbald@...>
>
> First off it ywould be pointless to make a quest item NO TRADE since you
> could then drop it on the ground for someone else to pick up.
>
> Second, my guess is that allowing us to place NO DROP items just in the
> bank may be more difficult than it seems. Coding wise they probably just
> have a check to see that where you place a NO DROP item or container with
a
> NO DROP item is somewhere other than on your personal inventory. There may
> not be an easy way at that point to discern between the bank and some
other
> location. Then again they simply may not want to make the effort...
>
> Good Journey,
>
> Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)
